com.mapzen.tangram.viewholder

Interface GLViewHolder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GLSurfaceViewHolder

    public interface GLViewHolder
    Interface which holds a GL View, used to display Tangram Map

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  GLViewHolder.RenderMode 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GLViewHolder.RenderMode getRenderMode()
      Get the current rendering mode.
      android.view.View getView()
      Can be used by the client to get access to the underlying view to pass any view controls
      void onDestroy()
      Destroys the GL Thread associated with the GLViewHolder
      void onPause()
      Pause the rendering thread, optionally tearing down the EGL context depending upon the value of preserveEGLContextOnPause.
      void onResume()
      Resumes the rendering thread, re-creating the OpenGL context if necessary.
      void queueEvent(java.lang.Runnable r)
      Queue a runnable to be run on the GL rendering thread.
      void requestRender()
      Request that the renderer render a frame.

      Set the renderer associated with this view.
      void setRenderMode(GLViewHolder.RenderMode renderMode)
      Set the rendering mode.

    • Method Detail

      • setRenderer

        void setRenderer(android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.Renderer renderer)
        Set the renderer associated with this view. Also starts the thread that will call the renderer, which in turn causes the rendering to start.
        Parameters:
        renderer - the renderer to use to perform OpenGL drawing.

      • setRenderMode

        void setRenderMode(GLViewHolder.RenderMode renderMode)
        Set the rendering mode. When GLViewHolder.RenderMode is RENDER_CONTINUOUSLY, the renderer is called repeatedly to re-render the scene. When GLViewHolder.RenderMode is RENDER_WHEN_DIRTY, the renderer only rendered when the surface is created, or when requestRender() is called. Defaults to RENDER_CONTINUOUSLY.
        Parameters:
        renderMode - one of the GLViewHolder.RenderMode enums

      • getRenderMode

        GLViewHolder.RenderMode getRenderMode()
        Get the current rendering mode.
        Returns:
        the current rendering mode.

      • requestRender

        void requestRender()
        Request that the renderer render a frame.

      • queueEvent

        void queueEvent(java.lang.Runnable r)
        Queue a runnable to be run on the GL rendering thread.
        Parameters:
        r - the runnable to be run on the GL rendering thread.

      • onPause

        void onPause()
        Pause the rendering thread, optionally tearing down the EGL context depending upon the value of preserveEGLContextOnPause.

      • onResume

        void onResume()
        Resumes the rendering thread, re-creating the OpenGL context if necessary.

      • onDestroy

        void onDestroy()
        Destroys the GL Thread associated with the GLViewHolder

      • getView

        android.view.View getView()
        Can be used by the client to get access to the underlying view to pass any view controls
        Returns:
        GLSurfaceView or Client provided implementation for a view held by GLViewHolder
